title: Air pollution
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Air - Pollution
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Pollution - Environmental aspects
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Pollution - Control equipment
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Environment - Social aspects
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental health
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental education
description: Defines air pollution and views the many man-made and natural causes. Uses plant life to show how pollution affects health and the economy. Discusses elimination of the sources of pollution and possible methods of control. Covers facts and broad social trends relating to the problem.
